innhold.avsnitt: Several changes have been made in 2018 and 2019 regarding the length of the parental benefit period and the parents’ quotas. Below is a summary of these changes.

lesmer.intro: 80 per cent parental benefit from 1 January 2019
lesmer.avsnitt: If the parental benefit period starts in 2019 and you have chosen 80 per cent parental benefit:

lesmer.intro: Children born or adopted between 1 July 2018 and 31 December 2018
Twins or multiple children born or adopted on or after 1 July 2018
lesmer.avsnitt: Parents who have twins or several children at the same time receive more weeks of parental benefit. These weeks are called “multiple children weeks”.
Twins and adoption of two children at the same time

liste.punkt: 17 multiple children weeks if you have chosen 100 per cent parental benefit
21 multiple children weeks if you have chosen 80 per cent parental benefit

lesmer.avsnitt: Birth and adoption of 3 or more children at the same time

liste.punkt: 46 multiple children weeks if you have chosen 100 per cent parental benefit
56 multiple children weeks if you have chosen 100 per cent parental benefit

lesmer.intro: Children born or adopted before 1 July 2018

liste.punkt: Plus 5 multiple children weeks for each extra child
Plus 7 multiple children weeks for each extra child
